overview.name: Antenma carriers
overview.description:
Based on the name "Antenna Carrier," it could refer to a device or structure used for carrying antennas for communication purposes, such as on top of buildings, towers, or vehicles.

An antenna is a device that is designed to transmit or receive electromagnetic waves. These waves can be used to carry information over a distance, such as in radio communication, television broadcasting, or satellite communication. There are many types of antennas, including dipole antennas, patch antennas, helical antennas, parabolic antennas, and many others.
